metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5271 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The TripleO Heat templates (tripleo-heat-templates) do not properly order the Identity Service (keystone) before the OpenStack Object Storage (Swift) staticweb middleware in the swiftproxy pipeline when the staticweb middleware is enabled, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information from private containers via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-tripleo-heat-templates - 5.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tripleo-heat-templates package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.0-1').
